name: MYC_MESG_RCP_STAFF
description: This table holds the In Basket Staff Recipients (I WMG 196) item, which is the final staff (EMP) recipients for this Patient Access Message (WMG) record.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID used to identify a web based chart system message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of read data associated with an individual web based chart system message record.

columns.name: IB_STAFF_RECIP_ID
columns.description: This stores the user (EMP) ID of the final recipient of this message.

columns.name: IB_STAFF_RECIP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
